mapper.select: select count(*) from account where id=#{id}
select * from account where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update account set pw=#{pw}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from account where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select a.* from ( select rownum rn, ac.* from account ac where name like '%'||#{kwd}||'%' order by adate desc ) a order by rn
